attributes.action: The U.K. Government to reinstate full overseas aid to Yemen.
attributes.background: The most vulnerable people in Yemen are suffering the most severe hardships. Despite the domestic issues of COVID-19 we must not forget our global responsibility to help war torn countries such as Yemen. The price is small for the U.K. but the cost is dear for the Yemenese.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577527
